description: This view contains audit data for the Continued Care and Services Coordination (CCSC) and Payer Communication workflows. Each row corresponds to a single audited event from those workflows.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: AUDIT_EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the event type (adding recipient, changing status, changing override fax, or changing override phone) of the item being changed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Adding Recipient


Removing Recipient


Changing Status


Changing Override Fax


Changing Override Phone


Changing Selected Caregiver Flag


Changing Override Contact Name


Changing Address


Changing Selected Service Flag


Selecting Specialty


Deselecting Specialty


Changing Completion


Selecting Service


Deselecting Service


Archiving Service Provider


Marking Service Provider Patient Preferred


Removing Patient Preference for Service Provider


Adding No Patient Preference Flag


Removing No Patient Preference Flag


Adding Follow-ups


Removing Follow-ups


Change Encounter-Specific Fax

columns.name: AUDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: This is the ID of the user who is making the item change.

columns.name: AUDIT_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This is the time instant of the item change.

columns.name: RECIPIENT_EXTERNAL
columns.description: This column stores the name of the recipient for this audit event in external format. For CCSC audit events this is the name of the service provider. For Payer Communication audit events this is the name of the payer recipient.

columns.name: DP_COORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coordination type of an item being changed as part of the Continued Care and Services Coordination (post-discharge services or placement for the patient) workflow.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Destination


Durable Medical Equipment


Dialysis/Infusion


Home Medical Care


Community Resources

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: This is the old value of the item being changed.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: This is the new value of the item being changed.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: This is the externally formatted old value of the item being changed. The internally formatted value is stored in the AUDIT_OLD_VALUE column.  For example, if the AUDIT_OLD_VALUE includes a category value, then this column will store the category title that describes the category value. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: This is the externally formatted new value of the item being changed. The internally formatted value is stored in the AUDIT_NEW_VALUE column.  For example, if the AUDIT_NEW_VALUE includes a category value, then this column will store the category title that describes the category value. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: CHANGED_DATA_ELEMENT
columns.description: The column descriptor that contains the metadata to be associated with data stored in columns OLD_VALUE_INTERNAL and NEW_VALUE_INTERNAL.
